page.title: 07Health in the Wolfords
page.content: The Wolfords and Todenham are served predominantly by Doctors from Moreton in Marsh and Shipston on Stour but also from Chipping Norton. Para-Medical services include district nurses, Health visitors, Meals on Wheels which are delivered by voluntary workers, and home helps. There are cottage hospitals at Moreton in Marsh and Shipston on Stour. Both these Hospitals provide 24 hour Casualty cover. Serious cases are referred to Oxford, Banbury, Cheltenham and Warwick. Ambulance cover is from Gloucestershire and Warwickshire. There are two day centres, one in Moreton and one in Shipston. These enable elderly or ill patients who live at home to receive occupational therapy, physiotherapy, baths and meals and in doing so, give their relatives a rest.
